metadata.Title: CVE-2022-34035 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
HTMLDoc v1.9.12 and below was discovered to contain a heap overflow viae_node htmldoc/htmldoc/html.cxx:588.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-34035` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

htmldoc - 1.9.16-1
htmldoc-common - 1.9.16-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.16-1').
